name: sonically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to sound: Sonically, this album is less guitar-driven. Her music aims to engage the audience not only sonically, but also emotionally and intellectually.
More examplesFewer examplesThe concert hall's performance space is huge and sonically amazing.Sonically, this is the most interesting album the band have ever made.This latest release is perhaps more sonically adventurous than her previous songs.This recording is her most sonically exhilarating, lyrically passionate effort in two decades.The range of the bird's repertoire is extensive and sonically exquisite.
